meanings.definition: To make a loud, deep sound like a lion.
meanings.sent1: The lion roars in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The thunder roars in the stormy sky.
meanings.sent3: The bear tried to roar like a lion but sounded funny.
meanings.sent4: The engine roars to life as the car accelerates.
meanings.sent5: The wind roars through the trees, creating a symphony of nature.

meanings.sent1: The roar of the crowd filled the stadium.
meanings.sent2: The roar of the waterfall echoed through the canyon.
meanings.sent3: The roar of the vacuum cleaner startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: The roar of the ocean waves soothed her troubled mind.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the lion sent shivers down their spines.
